column5: a boy died after being bitten in the face by an unknown species of venomous snake. The tragic incident occurred in a field near the  village of Ormal
column7: Preah Netr Preah district.------According to sources
column8: children go out to the rice fields near the village every night to collect grasshoppers
column9: frogs and sometimes snakes to eat. ------The 15-year-old victim
column11: was bitten by a snake and died at the home of Tuoun Chhuon
column13: as he was trying to get home to his parents.------After the incident
column14: the body was released for the traditional festival.------https://tvfb.news/article/13860------
